message:
I would be surprised if Mono supplied a SynchronizationContext to its Console apps. You can always check SynchronizationContext.Current - it should be null.

That said, I have seen the droid and iOS versions of Mono behave very strangely (and incorrectly) with thread pool semantics, task schedulers, etc. I believe they've already taken the MS implementations of the thread pool and at least part of the TPL, and they're planning to move even more to .NETCore. Looking forward to that...
